Description: Body sherd of Chian Mature Animal Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior glazed streaky black with rosette in added white outline with added red centres; below, trace of two white bands; exterior, slip worn; painted decoration consisting of bull (part of forelegs and neck remaining) to right; dot rosette as filling ornament; below, two dilute bands.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0556) (phase 2)
